name: Four Rendezvous
summary:
男主角做着奇怪的梦。这些梦是如此的真实，仿佛是在体验另一个人的生活。他本在撰写自己的小说并梦想有一天能够成功出版。但自从遇见一位神秘的女孩后这一切都改变了。他将不得不在错综复杂的状况中寻找自己的真爱，做出没有把握且艰难的选择，进而取得最艰难的胜利——战胜自我。
The hero of the novel has strange dreams. They seem to be so real that they look like pieces of another life of some kind. He also writes his own novel and dreams about publishing it someday. But meeting this mysterious girl has changed everything. The hero will have to tear through the plot intricacies, find his love and make a hard and inconclusive choice, having the toughest victory - victory over himself.
